name: stemroller-next
description: Isolate vocals, drums, bass, and other instrumental stems from any song
author: StemRoller Next Developers

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev STEMROLLER_RUN_FROM_SOURCE=true npm run dev:all
scripts.build:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:svelte && npm run build:electron:mac
scripts.build:mac:x64: cross-env NODE_ENV=production STEMROLLER_TARGET_ARCH=x64 npm run build:svelte && npm run build:electron:mac:x64
scripts.build:mac:arm64: cross-env NODE_ENV=production STEMROLLER_TARGET_ARCH=arm64 npm run build:svelte && npm run build:electron:mac:arm64
scripts.build:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:svelte && npm run build:electron:win
scripts.build:electron:mac: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -m --config electron-builder.config.json; codesign --force --deep --sign - dist/mac*/StemRoller\ Next.app || true
scripts.build:electron:mac:x64: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -m --x64 --config electron-builder.config.json; codesign --force --deep --sign - dist/mac/StemRoller\ Next.app || true
scripts.build:electron:mac:arm64: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -m --arm64 --config electron-builder.config.json; codesign --force --deep --sign - dist/mac-arm64/StemRoller\ Next.app || true
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production STEMROLLER_RUN_FROM_SOURCE=true npm run start:all
